ul.li: If a background image is specified, the value of "background-position" plus background-repeat may specify how it will look in y-direction.

body.p:
If statement above is true, this should have a button pattern which makes a "stripe" horizontally across the middle center of the canvas. The rules applied are "p {background-image: url(ovalbbut.gif); background-repeat: repeat-x; background-position: center}"
All other properties of this page should be UA-default.
